name: BBall
description:
DESCRIPTION

You are the so called Soldier B84-LL.
Also known as the Tiny BBall.

Your objective is to destroy all the enemy loot boxes by shooting them.

Jumping around is your best, so have fun doing your job!

CONTROLS

AD/Left-Right - Movement

Click - Shoot

POST MORTEM

This is one of my worst entries so far. I made this game in ~6hours between classes, job and participating in the Jam. This weekend was crazy af. I decided to take my time and during this week I'll upload the audio.

Anyway, I hope u like it.

CONTACT

Twitter: @carlosvVkk

GMail: carlosizquierdo.dev@gmail.com

LDJAM41 Entry: BBall
